options.title: Ocean blue
options.description: A stunningly vibrant freshwater shrimp, renowned for its captivating blue hue that evokes the colors of the deep sea. Its semi-transparent body showcases shades ranging from sapphire blue to aqua, creating a shimmering effect under aquarium lighting. Its black, bead-like eyes stand out against the vivid backdrop of its exoskeleton, giving the shrimp a striking appearance.
